segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she’s just polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, standing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, like she’s waiting for the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know how much trouble they’re in if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just asking for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
